variable.name: FAMID
variable.comment: Note: FAMID and SUBJID must both be used as a compound key to link subject-level data files with other PLINK input files

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: Note: FAMID and SUBJID must both be used as a compound key to link subject-level data files with other PLINK input files

variable.name: FATHER
variable.comment: SUBJID of father, if father is in cohort De-identified, generated value shared with sibling, if sibling is in cohort and father is not.
variable.value: Neither father nor sibling in cohort

variable.name: MOTHER
variable.comment: SUBJID of mother if mother is in cohort De-identified, generated value shared with sibling, if sibling is in cohort and mother is not.
variable.value: Neither mother nor sibling in cohort

variable.name: TWIN_ID
variable.description: Unique ID per set of siblings.
variable.comment: The TWIN_ID is unique to this file, it does not link to any other data sets. Each set of monozygotic siblings in the cohort, will have a unique ID. null=There is no monozygotic sibling in the cohort.
